name: Untitled Boss Fight
description:
Just a simple Boss-fight. Controller supported. Highly, HIGHLY recommend downloading it. The web-version tends to be finicky.

For better or worse, these are the legends that made it possible;

- All of the cinematic masterpieces provided by @VOD.Music. If ever your eardrums need tingling, check him out.

- All the gorgeous sprite-models provided by LootDadgummit. A master craftsmen of the 3D arts, definitely pay him a visit.

All the rest,
- Yours Truly
